name: InvasivePneumococcalDiseaseTestsForStreptococcusPneumoniaeNucleicAcidInSpecimenFromNormallySterileSite
title: Invasive Pneumococcal Disease (Tests for Streptococcus pneumoniae Nucleic Acid in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Streptococcus pneumoniae nucleic acid from a normally sterile site),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: streptococcus pneumoniae nucleic acid),(Exclusion Criteria: Specimen = Urine, Sputum, Unspecified, XXX.swab)
